raw_comment:
Something that I notice is that Indonesia is significantly higher that every other county for both young and older people. This makes me wonder what events in Indonesia caused everyone to be so happy and optimistic about the world. This relates to the community because it shows that the younger generation is more optimistic than the older generation.

Title-Is the world better?
ace_sentences: I notice that Indonesia is significantly higher than every other country for young people.
I notice that Indonesia is significantly higher than every other country for older people.
I wonder what events in Indonesia caused everyone in Indonesia to be happy.
I wonder what events in Indonesia caused everyone in Indonesia to be optimistic about the world.
This shows that the younger generation is more optimistic than the older generation.
The title is: Is the world better?
